isis.stitle: T 444E Diesel Engine Diagnostics (NAVPAK) (1997) - SECTION 3.5: ELECTRONIC CONTROL SYSTEM DIAGNOSTICS, ACCELERATOR PEDAL POSITION SENSOR/IVS SWITCH (APS/IVS) - CRUISE CONTROL, PTO, HAND THROTTLE SYSTEM - FAULT DETECTION MANAGEMENT

svcproc.title: FAULT DETECTION MANAGEMENT
svcproc.para: The ECM monitors the signals for proper voltages and will set flash code 221. If the ignition switch is turned off the fault will be recorded as an inactive fault.

para.emph: ECM: SCCS SWITCH OR CIRCUIT FAULT

svcproc.para: The ECM monitors the cruise control and PTO inputs. If the expected value for each input does not match the expected status, a fault code is set.
